reviews.review: its a game that people play
游戏从前几年看 624直播的时候知道的，当时一直没时间没钱玩，到上个月才开始真正入坑。游戏大概的体验和看直播的感觉差不多，只是玩久了就会少了些许恐怖的感觉。非常希望杀鸡能改一些规则，比如直接拔线的要禁赛时长，现在拔线的情况太多了，没法玩。能否出些其他游戏模式，大冒险，合作类，人机类 。还有就是低阶屠夫排人 排个半小时都没人，咋玩，只能玩人类了。祝愿游戏越来越好，玩家能玩得开心。

This is an amazing horror game that tests your skill, attentiveness, and your ability to work with others. This is not a game for people who are looking for something easy however. There are a lot of skilled players in this game, and will be extremely difficult if you won't put the time in. So, I bid you all a happy hunting season.
excited challenge enjoy

If you like playing mind games against your opponent, then give this a whirl. It'll take a bit to grind up starting a new, but the customization of the right perks might just change your mind later on. Applies for both Kiiler and Survivor.

In essence with this game, its 4v1 (four survivors, 1 killer). Survivor is less stressful than killer; but your success as survivor is based on your teamwork. Just know that there are times when the game can frustrate you (killers can camp survivors, sometimes a fellow survivor can unhook you infront of killer). If you are new to the game, I suggest 1) Knowing about the tier of perks for both survivor and killer 2) Watching the pro DBD players (i like monto, puppers and otz) 3) Having fun with one survivor/killer [I am still enjoying the scoops ahoy Steve Harrington, even if it has become a meme) 4) Know when its best to be altruistic vs survive) [more so when the exit gates are open]
BUENARDO

This game caters so heavily to GARBAGE KILLERS that cry about survivors making them look bad because they're (wait for it) GARBAGE... It's honestly one of the most BS things about the game, the killers get to complain about something and its instantly nerfed while survivors who have been given a severe lower hand already have to try so hard that their parents are wondering where they've been for the past 3 hours because games take that long to find. They don't care about the survivors. They don't care about you. Don't buy this game. Buy minecraft, people don't tunnel in minecraft. The amount of catering to killers in this game is astounding but do you see any killers saying "haha good game man you got me good nice escape" NO its always some terrible insta-down killer complaining about how you brought decisive strike, and borrowed time. guess what.... THAT'S THE ONLY WAY TO SURVIVE, not to mention the overpowered add-ons/perks all the killers have, Seeing through walls, NOED, BBQ, NOED, franklins, NOED, and ruin/overcharge/surge/thrilling/corrupt/popgoestheweasel oh did I mention noed? THEY HAVE SO MANY GENERATOR REGRESSION PERKS ITS STUPID. what do the survivors get to even the playing field? Pebbles/fast crouching/ running 3 seconds at full speed then becoming a sloth/ jumping through windows then becoming a sloth/ and pallets that are STILL broken half the time.... Waste of time. until the devs give some love to the shitty role that is survivor this game is doomed.

****EDIT****
After playing the Public Test Beta released 11/19/19 I'd like to revise this by saying that the devs have done it. They have actually made the game UNPLAYABLE. The servers have no less than 100 ping at any time, the hitboxes and hit registering have hit an all time low as you can now be hit while in a different area code or from a different map. The new killer that "is based around slugging" is so broken it hurts. He is the hillbilly that could with his cross-map sprinting and insta-downs. And what do we get in return as survivors? "if ya stay real close to someone being carried, they wiggle a bit faster." Guess what, iron grasp exists. I will end this revision by stating if the killer is not fixed before releasing it into the actual game, the player base will drop dramatically and maybe a red flag will pop up and the devs will finally realize they cater to the worse of people. But lets be real here. they are in it for the quick cash grab. In the few months I've played this game ive seen nothing but nerfs to survivors and buffs to killers that don't need them. Decisive strike's skill check is now smaller while the cannibal's base speed while chainsawing is now equivalent to sonic the hedgehog. I'm done playing this game. It has not been enjoyable, it has not been fun, the devs hate you. Buy something else.

1. Дикий дисбаланс. Разрабы видят только сурвов в группах, что им играть легче, не обращая внимания что соло сурвы откровенно сосут. Продолжайте апать маньяков, зачем нужен баланс. Я, играя в первый раз за маньяка, разнес группу из 10 рангов в сухую(а ведь я постоянно косячил).
2. Разрабы ничего не могут сделать с матчмейкингом: Поиск за маньяков 15-20 минут(за сурвов 1-2 минуты), а даже если найдет - на тебе ошибку с NAT подключением.
3. Купи игру, задонать в игру для получения хороших способностей, ну или купи длс.
4. А помнишь, что за маньяков легче играть? Хочешь быстрее прокачать сурва? Пошел нахер, сранный урод. Испытание за маньяка даст 60к очков, а за сурва 20к.
-
Игра с отличной задумкой, но разработчики не хотят исправлять проблемы, либо просто глупые и не понимают как это сделать. Если хотите получить хоть какое нибудь удовольствие от игры - играйте в пати из 4 человек за сурвов. Или соберите пати из 5 человек, играйте в Своей игре. Прокачка чего-либо просто выведет вас из себя.

This is a very original game with a very creative story as to how they bring all of the killers and survivors together.  I am also impressed with how thrilling the game can be.  I have managed to bring in a slew of my friends to play the game, and despite how toxic I can be online sometimes, I still think there is much enjoyment to be had. 
The two downsides are pretty rough.  
1. The community is so super toxic that it may turn you away from playing.  AKA- Survivors being so upset they lost to the killer that they will call the killer a camper.  To which they have at least 5 different definitions of the term, so that it always seems to fit into their gripe.
2. generators are repaired way too fast.  Killers are FORCED to take Hex:Ruin just to keep up, and this rarely helps, since the survivors have ways to find and destroy the Totems.  This also doesn't help when the survivors are able to simply by-pass the effects of your Hex: Ruin by simply clicking the generator for only a single second then releasing and repeating, so that they never get a skill check hit them.  If the devs would add a five (5) second build-up time before the generator progressed any further each time anyone clicked to repair a generator, it would put an end to this exploit. 
This game is still very fun and extremely addictive.  I hope those whom try it out, wont let the toxic community hold them back.  Good luck out there!

THIS IS WHAT I ONCE SAID:  Great game.  Watch out for potatoes.  And that isn't a bug, that's a feature.

What I now say:  649 hours of game play later and the game is so freaking chock full of bug that I can't stand it.  Just had a match in which I completed an archive event and daily ritual and was on my way to keep the killer distracted and then... boop... disconnected for "no network connection".   My Team Speak stayed up.  My steam stayed connecting.  The connection to DBD just gone.  And what does the game do?  bans me from a new match for 5 minutes.  Because fuck you that's why.

I THINK WE A PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR.  Fuck you and your bug ridden bullshit.  Fix the game.

Whilst I cannot call this a horror game (the only times you can get some sense of fear is either when one of the stealthier killers manage to get a good sneak up on you or when you are about to lose that special toolbox you risked taking into the game with you), I do enjoy it. It brings mix of feelings from excitement, through rage and end on just pure sad. You can be sure that there will be differences between some trials (not the one's with the cannibal cuz their mains do love a good camp) as each killer offers a unique play style. Chose survivor, killer or both sides for a rush off fun/anger. Get called a cheater or a camper, be blamed for the team loss it's all here, including a few bugs here and there. I've sold my soul already, now it's your turn.
